document.full_text: about 40 people joined a syrian protest tuesday, briefly chanting political slogans, witnesses said, in the first challenge to the ruling baath party since civil unrest swept countries across the arab world.
document.title: rare political protest held in syria: witnesses
lines_and_colors: about 40 people joined a syrian protest tuesday, briefly chanting political slogans, witnesses said, in the first challenge to the ruling baath party since civil unrest swept countries across the arab world.
